Class Puzzle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Puzzle

  • public class Puzzle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods and a constructor for a puzzle containing 26 byte arrays. Fulfills the requirements of Question 1
    Author:
    Luke Okomilo, Eddie Thuo

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private byte[] combineArrays(byte[] zeroBits, byte[] puzzleNumbers, byte[] key)
      Responsible for combining the 16 byte array of all zeros followed by the unique 2 byte array number and the last 6 bytes of the key of all zeros to create a puzzle.
